ingredients.ingredient: 6 ounces provolone cheese, cut into 12 strips
¼ cup green chile peppers, diced

cookingTips: Butterfly shrimp carefully to create a pocket for the cheese and pepper filling
Wrap bacon snugly to prevent it from falling off during cooking
Broil instead of baking for crispier bacon and more caramelization
enrichment.coachingPrompt: These elegant appetizers combine surf and turf flavors. What temperature and timing would you use for perfectly cooked bacon and tender shrimp?
